outline:
1. to smelt, refine, test
    1. (Qal)
      1. to smelt, refine
      2. to test
      3. to test (and prove true)
      4. smelter, refiner, goldsmith (participle)
    2. (Niphal) to be refined
    3. (Piel) to be a refiner
      1. refiner (participle)
kjv_def: cast, (re-) fine(-er), founder, goldsmith, melt, pure, purge away, try.
strongs_def: to fuse (metal), i.e. refine (literally or figuratively)
